title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 283: Featuring Hal Gill
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Hal Gill. Hal joined (58:32) to talk about the Bubble, his job doing radio for the Preds, playing with Whit and a bunch more. The guys also break down the qualifying round, the 1984 World Series MVP, Henrik Lundqvist and a whole bunch more. The guys wrap up with a little Gambling Corner update and some golf talk.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
